participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and outgoing, loves to connect with others and share interests.
participant_1.background: I am a girl. I own a car. My favorite color is blue. I love dogs. I love sushi.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and dedicated, always strives for success and enjoys music.
participant_2.background: My favorite rapper is Yo Gotti. God has always been put first in my life. I am addicted to the hit show Empire. I take pride in getting straight A's.

content.text: Hey, I'm participant_1. What's your name?
I'm participant_2. Nice to meet you!
Nice to meet you too! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch Empire, listen to music, and play video games.
Oh, I love Empire! What's your favorite episode?
I think the pilot episode was my favorite. It was so good!
I agree! It was a great way to introduce the characters and the story.
Who's your favorite character on the show?
I'm torn between Cookie and Lucious. They're both so complex and interesting.
I love both of them too! Cookie is such a strong woman, and Lucious is so talented.
I know, right? They're both such great characters.
What's your favorite song by Yo Gotti?
I really like "Rake It Up" and "Down in the DM."
Those are both great songs! I love his flow and his lyrics.
Me too! He's such a talented rapper.
What's your favorite color?
I like blue. It's so calming and relaxing.
I love blue too! It's my favorite color for clothes.
Me too! It's also my favorite color for nails.
We have so much in common! I love meeting new people who share my interests.
Me too! It's always so much fun to talk to people who get you.
I know, right? I'm glad we met.
Me too!
